mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT m.id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.type,m.path, m.component,m.perms,m.icon,m.sort_value,m.status, m.create_time,m.update_time,m.is_deleted
FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.id IN (SELECT rm.menu_id FROM sys_role_menu rm WHERE rm.role_id IN (SELECT ur.role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND ur.is_deleted=0 ) AND rm.is_deleted=0 ) AND m.status=1 AND m.is_deleted=0;
